title: Research GoDaddy M365 API access for bmo@bmobot.ai
description:
Dave is trying to get API access to the bmo@bmobot.ai email (M365 Exchange account provisioned through GoDaddy). The Microsoft Entra admin UI keeps redirecting to GoDaddy's admin settings. Need to research:
- Can GoDaddy-provisioned M365 accounts access Entra/Azure AD directly?
- How to get API keys (Microsoft Graph API) for GoDaddy M365 accounts
- Is this a paid feature GoDaddy locks down?
- Workarounds or alternatives

Save research to a file for later discussion.

actions.note: Research saved to .claude/state/research/godaddy-m365-api-access.md. TL;DR: GoDaddy's M365 is a federated tenant that blocks Entra admin access by design. Best path is defederation (official Microsoft process, no data loss). Quick workarounds to try first: portal.azure.com directly, or PowerShell app registration.
